org.qbroker.receiver

Class LogReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.receiver.Receiver
      • org.qbroker.receiver.LogReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageReceiver

    public class LogReceiver
extends Receiver
    LogReceiver listens to a log file and fetches all new entries of it. It appends the new log entries as JMS Messages to an XQueue. LogReceiver supports flow control and allows object control from its owner. It is fault tolerant with retry and idle options.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com

        public void receive(XQueue xq,
                    int baseTime)
        Description copied from interface: MessageReceiver
        puts all the received JMS messages to the XQueue as the output. In case of failure, it should keep retry with the sleepTime in milliseconds.
